MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL31 postcode area of Llandudno Junction, affecting customers in Marl Crescent. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.16PM. Our engineers have established that there is there is a fault on the underground cable network and that repairs will be complex so we are arranging for generators to restore power, and this should happen by 2AM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.35PM on 19th February 2021
